echo.message: java version: ${ant.java.version}
Error: Missing needed package Xerces.
You first need to install Xerces (http://xml.apache.org/xerces-j/)
and add it to your classpath, before you can compile and use MMBase.
Error: Missing needed package javax.servlet.
You first need to add servlet.jar to your classpath,
before you can compile and use MMBase.
You'll probably find it somewhere in your servlet-engine dir.
Warning: Missing optional package Xalan.
You first need to install Xalan (http://xml.apache.org/xalan/)
and add it to your classpath, before you can use all the features of MMBase.
MMBase will compile and run without this package,
if you remove the xslconvert module from your modules.xml.
Warning: Missing optional package javax.jai.
You can't use the java based Image-Converter without this package,
you've got to use ImageMagick.
JAI can be downloaded from http://www.javasoft.com/products/java-media/jai/
MMBase will compile and run without this package.
Warning: Missing optional package Log4j.
Logging capabalities will be very limited.
Log4j can be downloaded from http://jakarta.apache.org/log4j/
The Log4j Implementation of MMBase will not compile,
but MMBase will run without this package though.
Warning: Missing optional package JUnit.
You will not be able to run tests.
JUnit can be downloaded from http://www.unit.org/
The JUnit tests for MMBase will not compile,
but MMBase will run without this package though.
Warning: Missing optional package com.informix.jdbc.
Informix support for MMBase will not be compiled,
but MMBase will run without this package though.
